channel.title: Engine error
channel.description:
Ok, whenever I start playing the HL2 Episode 1 mod Minerva the game shuts down at a random time and I get this error: Internal driver error in IDirect3DDevice 9 :stuck_out_tongue: resent (). I have the latest video card drivers and the latest version of DirectX. This hasn't been a problem some ten months ago. Here are my specs:
- AMD Athlon(tm) 64 Processor 3000+ 1.99 GHz Performance Rated at 3.00
- 1 GB RAM
- Microsoft Windows XP Home Edition
- NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GS

item.title: Engine error
item.dc:creator: Paddy
item.description:
It wont. Thats your fix right there.

Read full topic

item.title: Engine error
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
It seems reinstalling DirectX did the trick. Thanks guys. If it still crashes I’ll let you know.

Read full topic

item.title: Engine error
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
and try to re-install DX

Read full topic

item.title: Engine error
item.dc:creator: Repzik
item.description:
Try updating your drivers, then come back if that doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Engine error
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
Ok I tried the directX8 command but sadly it didn’t help. Could it be a driver issue?

Read full topic

item.title: Engine error
item.dc:creator: Angdraug
item.description:
Well if you run the game in dx8 it’s pretty certain the graphics will get downgraded. For example the water would revert to cheap water.

Read full topic

item.title: Engine error
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
Well yeah that could work but will the graphics get downgraded?

Read full topic

item.title: Engine error
item.dc:creator: Xilefian
item.description:
try right clicking on it in steam, go to properties, set launch options to “-dxlevel 80” without the quotes

Read full topic
